name: InfernoSpeed
blurb: A fast paced, module based spaceship role playing game in a sandbox universe. Level your crew, explore, loot, trade, build, and battle!

rewards.reward: (Early-bird special) Our sincere gratitude for your pledge! + a DRM-Free digital download of the full game.
Missed the early-bird special? this tier will also include our sincere gratitude for your pledge! + a DRM-Free digital download of the full game.

Our sincere gratitude for your pledge! + a DRM-Free digital download of the full game + you will be listed in the in-game credits as a supporter + you will get to choose "I backed InfernoSpeed" avatar icons on the project forums.

(UNIQUE tier - 2 x pack) Our sincere gratitude for your pledge! + TWO DRM-Free digital downloads of the full game, give one to your friend! + you and your friend will be listed in the in-game credits as a supporter + you will get to choose "I backed InfernoSpeed" avatar icons on the project forums.

Our sincere gratitude for your pledge! + a DRM-Free digital download of the full game + you will be listed in the in-game credits as a supporter + you will get to choose "I backed InfernoSpeed" avatar icons on the project forums + digital download access to Soundtracks (mp3) + Concept-Arts + Game Manual (PDF).
